All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main class used only for initiating the vending machine program.
Change
The enum Change.
CmdUserIO
Command line/console user I/O for the vending machine program.
Controller
The controller for the vending machine application; performs core functionality.
DataIO
Interface designed for use with the vending machine program, to handle all backend I/O operations.
FileIO
A local, file-based implementation of the DataIO interface.
InsufficientFundsException
 
NoItemInventoryException
 
Services
Service layer class responsible for all financial and inventory calculations.
Stock
Object representation of a single type of item in the vending machine model.
UserIO
An interface for all User I/O for the vending machine program.
